sentences: Kas sul on piisa kodus? (Do you have enough at home?)
Minu meelest jääb siin veel piisa teha. (In my opinion, there is still plenty to do here.)
Tema elus oli alati piisa rahalist tugevust. (There was always sufficient financial strength in their life.)
context: The word 'piisa' refers to a quantity that is enough or adequate for the situation at hand.
